column4: anyone know where i can get some more screensavers for ubuntu?
xscreensaver and xlockmore have a lot of screensavers
i know but i want more :-P
electricsheep ?
have you seen it?  it's another screen saver.  see also kscreensaver
you probably need to ask the question
firestarter isn't really a firewall - it's just a front-end that configures the built-in iptables firewall.
you can uninstall firestarter, but iptables will still be built in
maybe your router is blocking it?
what do you see if you "sudo iptables -L | grep 6112" ?
i see nothing
if you "sudo iptables -L" then?
that means all ports are open
that's the default setup in ubuntu
but i have proven that when i have firestarter firewall enabled it blocks my port for the program
you see how firestarter is just configuring the iptables rules though?
i think so.
no, it's different.  solaris, hp-ux, linux - they're all kinds of UNIX
probably not different actually..? do you mean external or internal
I mean intermal
oh yes then certanly.
I'm guessing he set up a static IP in Windows, but ubuntu is using dhcp
yep
